name: Paper Skin
description:
A barebones singleplayer FPS. Player can move using WASD, jump, aim and shoot. 1 map, 5 weapons, ammo and health pickups. Up to 3 moving targets or "Bots".

Mouse = look

WASD / Right Click = move

Space = Jump

Left Shift = Aim

Left Click = Shoot

R/F = Reload

E = View Weapon

Mouse Wheel = Change Weapon

ESC = View menu
